nodes.text: Lake Sah'ot was a small lake on the planet of Chandrila, near Hanna City.

The lake's crystal clear waters made it a popular vacation spot for many, including Senator Mon Mothma, who had a dacha by the lake. Arhul Hextrophon enjoyed the view while staying at the dacha as he recuperated from wounds inflicted by an assassin during the siege of Caprioril.
